pageContent: Objectives: To describe the clinical characteristics, diagnostic features, prognosis, and outcome of patients with prostate cancer and disseminated intravascular coagulation with excessive fibrinolysis (DIC XFL).

metaData.source:
Adjuvant and neoadjuvant therapies in high risk localized prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/17310835/
